description.fr: {%fightstarted} Gagne {PropertyEffect:18}.{PMvalue:pmstart} et gagne {PropertyEffect:18}. \--- Lorsque votre héros traverse un adversaire\_: Lui inflige {value:v} dégâts. \--- {%DAMAGE_BASED_ON_ELEMENTARY}Lorsqu'un de vos compagnons ATTAQUE\_: {PMvalue:pm,+} à votre héros jusqu'à la fin du tour. \--- {PropertyEffect:18} ne réduit pas l'{%AT} de votre héros.
description.en: {%fightstarted} Gains {PropertyEffect:18}.{PMvalue:pmstart} and gains {PropertyEffect:18}. \--- When your hero goes through an opponent: Does {value:v} damage to them. \--- {%DAMAGE_BASED_ON_ELEMENTARY}When one of your companions ATTACKS: {PMvalue:pm,+} to your hero until the end of the turn. \--- {PropertyEffect:18} does not reduce your hero's {%AT}.
description.es: {%fightstarted} Gana {PropertyEffect:18}.{PMvalue:pmstart} y gana {PropertyEffect:18}. \--- Cuando tu héroe atraviesa a un adversario: Le inflige {value:v} de daño. \--- {%DAMAGE_BASED_ON_ELEMENTARY}Cuando uno de tus compañeros ATACA: {PMvalue:pm,+} a tu héroe hasta el final del turno. \--- {PropertyEffect:18} no reduce el {%AT} de tu héroe.
description.de: {%fightstarted} Verleiht {PropertyEffect:18}.{PMvalue:pmstart} und verleiht {PropertyEffect:18}. \--- Wenn dein Held einen Gegner überquert: Verursacht bei ihm {value:v} Schaden. \--- {%DAMAGE_BASED_ON_ELEMENTARY}Wenn einer deiner Begleiter ANGREIFT: {PMvalue:pm,+} für deinen Helden bis zum Ende der Runde. \--- {PropertyEffect:18} verringert den {%AT} deines Helden nicht.
description.pt: {%fightstarted} Ganha {PropertyEffect:18}.{PMvalue:pmstart} e ganha {PropertyEffect:18}. \--- Quando seu herói atravessa um adversário: Inflige a ele {value:v} danos. \--- {%DAMAGE_BASED_ON_ELEMENTARY}Quando um dos seus companheiros ATACA: {PMvalue:pm,+} ao seu herói até o fim do turno. \--- {PropertyEffect:18} não reduz o {%AT} do seu herói.

gameplayDescription.fr:
{PropertyEffect:18}\_: Tel un passe-muraille, traversez vos ennemis pour leur infliger des dégâts basés sur votre {%at}.
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%PM}</color>\_: Votre mobilité. C'est un petit pas pour vous, un grand pas pour votre victoire\_!
gameplayDescription.en:
{PropertyEffect:18}: As if endowed with the ability to walk through walls, go through your enemies to do damage to them based on your {%at}.
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%PM,plural:other}</color>: Your mobility. One small step for you, one giant leap for your victory!
gameplayDescription.es:
{PropertyEffect:18}: Atraviesa a tus enemigos cual fantasma para infligirles daños basados en tu {%at}.
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%PM}</color>: Tu movilidad. Un pequeño paso para ti, pero un gran paso para tu victoria.
gameplayDescription.de:
{PropertyEffect:18}: Du überquerst deine Feinde wie eine Abrissbirne und fügst ihnen basierend auf deinem {%at,plural:one} Schaden zu.
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%PM}</color>: Deine Bewegungsfreiheit. Ein kleiner Schritt für dich, doch ein großer Schritt in Richtung Sieg!
gameplayDescription.pt:
{PropertyEffect:18}: Tal qual um fantasma, atravesse seus inimigos para infligir danos com base no seu {%at}.
\---
<color=#7FD5E4>{%PM}</color>: Sua mobilidade. Um pequeno passo para você, mas um grande passo rumo à vitória!
